#### Voice call & SMS rates

Voice calls

SMS rates

N/A

within country

N/A

N/A

to Malaysia

N/A

to other countries

N/A

receiving calls

[How to buy](#how-to-buy-roaming-pass)[See other countries](#check)

Notes:

-   Roaming passes may only be used in specific areas of Thailand, India, and Myanmar. [Check excluded areas](https://help.celcomdigi.com/support/solutions/articles/70000657847-roaming-tips-and-tricks).
-   All roaming passes include 15 mins of voice calls, counted in 60-second blocks.
-   After the 15-mins quota is used, standard pay-per-use call rates will apply. [View rates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/637c596725cb8b7f82fe360b/66d51bd7095e15740db4d222_CelcomDigi%20Roaming%20PAYU%20Rates%20(CelcomDigi).pdf).
-   **Postpaid only**: Daily Roaming Pass charges apply in certain countries or when no roaming pass is used. Not available for prepaid users. [Learn more](https://www.celcomdigi.com/terms-conditions/roaming).

query: What safety features does CelcomDigi offer?

results.contentMarkdown:
## We take your safety seriously.

[



### Secure sign-in, verified identity



](#)

### Secure sign-in, verified identity

Fast, secure access with Face ID or fingerprint — tied to your NRIC or Passport for peace of mind. All your CelcomDigi lines and services stay protected under one trusted account, viewable only to you.



[

### Your trusted access to CelcomDigi



](#)

### Your trusted access to CelcomDigi

The CelcomDigi app is your secure way to connect with us. Every transaction is safe, every offer is official, every interaction trusted — all through your verified account.



[

### Linked to your device. Protected from everyone else.



](#)

### Linked to your device. Protected from everyone else.

Only one device can use your CelcomDigi app at a time, keeping your account safe from unauthorised access.



Essentials

## Everyday tasks, made easy.

[

## All your connections, one app

Prepaid, postpaid, fibre, family, and supplementary lines — all in one app.

](#steps-start)[

## Pay bills in seconds

Skip queues. Just tap and pay.

](#steps1)[

Never run out of credit again.

results.contentMarkdown:
## Get started with MobileSHIELD



#### Step 1

Subscribe to MobileSHIELD via [**CelcomDigi app**](https://celcomdigi.onelink.me/N2Te/hfo73wdf) and receive your login details via SMS.



#### Step 2

Download MobileSHIELD from the [App Store](https://celcomdigi.onelink.me/PeLv/sdm7ociw) or [Play Store](https://celcomdigi.onelink.me/PeLv/sdm7ociw) and log in with your mobile number.



#### Step 3

Open the app and follow the quick setup to activate your protection. For detailed setup steps, please [click here](https://help.celcomdigi.com/support/solutions/folders/70000487103).





[

Tonton tutorial Celcom Life

](#)

[

Tonton tutorial MyDigi

](#)
results.contentPlainText:
Get started with MobileSHIELD

Step 1

Subscribe to MobileSHIELD via CelcomDigi app and receive your login details via SMS.

Step 2

Download MobileSHIELD from the App Store or Play Store and log in with your mobile number.

Step 3

Open the app and follow the quick setup to activate your protection. For detailed setup steps, please click here.

Tonton tutorial Celcom Life

Tonton tutorial MyDigi
